biocontainers.name: epa-ng
biocontainers.summary: Massively parallel phylogenetic placement of genetic sequences

biotools.summary: Complete reimplementation of the evolutionary placement algorithm (EPA) that is substantially faster, offers a distributed memory parallelization, and integrates concepts from both, RAxML-EPA and PPLACER.

bioschemas.name: EPA-ng
bioschemas.summary: Complete reimplementation of the evolutionary placement algorithm (EPA) that is substantially faster, offers a distributed memory parallelization, and integrates concepts from both, RAxML-EPA and PPLACER.
